languages.text: "Прими мои соболезнования, Паскаль. Виновные уже наказаны — пусть это послужит тебе утешением".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed the Kiava Gamma quest.
Pasqal: "Observing the desecration perpetrated upon the manufactorums of Kiava Gamma is generating... unproductive signals in my cognitive circuitry. Initiating a mantra of pacification and mitigation of spiritual deterioration."

traits.locale_text: "Прими мои соболезнования, Паскаль. Виновные уже наказаны — пусть это послужит тебе утешением".

languages.text: "My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed the Kiava Gamma quest.
Pasqal: "Observing the desecration perpetrated upon the manufactorums of Kiava Gamma is generating... unproductive signals in my cognitive circuitry. Initiating a mantra of pacification and mitigation of spiritual deterioration."
languages.original_text: "Прими мои соболезнования, Паскаль. Виновные уже наказаны — пусть это послужит тебе утешением".

traits.locale_text: "My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."
"My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."
"My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."

"My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."

languages.text: 「パスカル、哀悼の意を表す。罪ある者はすでに裁かれた。どうか、それがお前の慰めとなるように」
languages.original_text: "My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、哀悼の意を表す。罪ある者はすでに裁かれた。どうか、それがお前の慰めとなるように」

languages.text: "Mein Beileid, Pasqal. Die Schuldigen wurden bereits bestraft, möget Ihr darin Trost finden."
languages.original_text: "My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Beileid, Pasqal. Die Schuldigen wurden bereits bestraft, möget Ihr darin Trost finden."

languages.text: « Mes condoléances, Pasqal. Les coupables ont déjà été punis ; j'espère que cela vous apporte au moins un peu de réconfort. »
languages.original_text: "My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."

traits.locale_text: « Mes condoléances, Pasqal. Les coupables ont déjà été punis ; j'espère que cela vous apporte au moins un peu de réconfort. »

languages.text: «Le acompaño en el sentimiento, Pasqal. Los culpables han sido castigados; espero que encuentre algún consuelo en eso».
languages.original_text: "My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."

traits.locale_text: «Le acompaño en el sentimiento, Pasqal. Los culpables han sido castigados; espero que encuentre algún consuelo en eso».

languages.text: “我很遗憾，帕斯卡。犯罪分子已经得到了惩罚，希望这能为你带来慰藉。”
languages.original_text: "My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."

traits.locale_text: “我很遗憾，帕斯卡。犯罪分子已经得到了惩罚，希望这能为你带来慰藉。”

languages.text: "Başın sağ olsun Pasqal. Suçlular cezalarını çekti, belki bunu bilmek acını hafifletir."
languages.original_text: "My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."

traits.locale_text: "Başın sağ olsun Pasqal. Suçlular cezalarını çekti, belki bunu bilmek acını hafifletir."

languages.original_text: "My condolences, Pasqal. The guilty have already been punished — may you find solace in that."
